title: Application Integration Issues
description: Troubleshoot application registration and integration problems with Azure AD.

queries.name: Application Authentication Failures
queries.query:
// Application Issues - Authentication failures
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(4h)
| where ResultType != "0"
| summarize FailureCount = count() by AppDisplayName, Status.errorCode, Status.failureReason
| order by FailureCount desc
| take 20

queries.name: Service Principal Issues
queries.query:
// Application Issues - Service Principal problems
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where Category == "ApplicationManagement"
| where Result == "failure"
| where OperationName contains "ServicePrincipal"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, ResultReason, TargetResources
| order by TimeGenerated desc

queries.name: Consent Issues
queries.query:
// Application Issues - Consent problems
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where OperationName contains "Consent"
| where Result == "failure"
| extend App = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName)
| extend User = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, App, User, ResultReason
| order by TimeGenerated desc

steps: Check application authentication failures for patterns
Review service principal permissions and configuration
Check redirect URIs and reply URLs
